etymology.description: 宋 (surname) + 庆龄 (given name) = the personal name “Song Qingling”.
etymology.interpretation: Combines the family name 宋 with the given name 庆龄, literally “celebrate + years/age.” Refers to Soong Ching-ling, a major 20th‑century Chinese political figure and wife of Sun Yat-sen.
etymology.simplification: 慶→庆 simplifies complex components; 齡→龄 via the 齒→齿 series. Both reduce stroke count and follow standard PRC simplification patterns.

parts.english: Song (surname); Song dynasty; ancient state of Song

examples.chinese: 宋庆龄是中国近现代史上的重要人物(宋慶齡是中國近現代史上的重要人物)。
examples.pinyin: Sòng Qìnglíng shì Zhōngguó jìn xiàndài shǐ shàng de zhòngyào rénwù.
examples.english: Song Qingling is an important figure in China’s modern and contemporary history.

examples.chinese: 她是孙中山的妻子，也曾担任中华人民共和国名誉主席(她是孫中山的妻子，也曾擔任中華人民共和國名譽主席)。
examples.pinyin: Tā shì Sūn Zhōngshān de qīzi, yě céng dānrèn Zhōnghuá Rénmín Gònghéguó míngyù zhǔxí.
examples.english: She was the wife of Sun Yat-sen and also served as the Honorary President of the PRC.

examples.chinese: 人们常用宋庆龄的名字命名学校和道路(人們常用宋慶齡的名字命名學校和道路)。
examples.pinyin: Rénmen cháng yòng Sòng Qìnglíng de míngzi mìngmíng xuéxiào hé dàolù.
examples.english: People often name schools and roads after Song Qingling.
